full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Residential Units for Purchase or Lease
#### Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking residential units for purchase or lease in North West River, Newfoundland and Labrador, within a 40 km radius. This opportunity is open to property owners or their agents who wish to offer suitable units.

#### Eligibility Criteria
To be considered, units must meet the following criteria:

*   Located within 40 km of North West River
*   Constructed in the past 10 years, with a maximum of two storeys in height
*   Single-family dwelling or individual residential unit (part of a duplex, four plex, townhouse, or row-house)
*   Living room, dining area, kitchen, one or more bedrooms, one full bathroom, laundry room, residential storage space, and two parking spots
*   Compatible with RCMP intended use, physical characteristics, neighbouring land uses, and environment
*   Available for occupancy by Spring 2023

#### Additional Requirements for Lease

*   Owner must agree to a three-year Potential Term, with two one-year options to renew
*   Owner must use RCMP standard Lease
*   Units must comply with Canada Labour Code, Canadian Electrical Code, National Building Code of Canada, and all other applicable Codes and Standards by the lease commencement date

#### Submission Guidelines
Property owners or their agents who wish to submit their units for consideration should provide the following information:

*   Proposed lot number and location
*   Current zoning
*   Size and floor layout of the unit
*   Interior and exterior photos
*   Date of availability
*   Owner's authorisation letter (if applicable)

Submission Deadline: January 31, 2023

Primary Contact: Meghan Churchill, RCMP - meghan.churchill@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

This tender is open to all, and only one correction was made to the areas using unsupported markdown. Markup was applied to **both** french and english embeddings.
